body: A good update that saves me from having to rename the numbers until 22. Wow, things have escalated fast... It started with a couple of loose numbers... And we already have 22 episodes and I love it XD. PD: And finally we have some action from Tajima Yuri! [The Chubby XD]

From the moment I understood the weakness of my flesh, it disgusted me. I craved the strength and certainty of steel. I aspired to the purity of the Blessed Machine.

Your kind cling to your flesh, as if it will not decay and fail you. One day the crude biomass that you call a temple will wither, and you will beg my kind to save you. But I am already saved, for the Machine is immortal…

...even in death I serve the Omnissiah.
